title: Compare Player Recruitment Options
description: A team needs a new player and must decide between signing a free agent or trading for a player from another team.

tasks.description: Identify the top available free agent and a realistic trade target for the desired position.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies one free agent and one trade target.

tasks.description: Compare the projected salary cost of the free agent against the cost of the players and assets required for the trade.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines that signing the free agent is the more cost-effective option.

tasks.description: Generate a report for the GM recommending they pursue the free agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report with a clear, financially-driven recommendation.
